title: Orientation
subtitle: Before each semester, VAS will collaborate with SIV to host an Orientation focusing on college introduction, orientation and assistance for students, especially new comers. The event will be annually taken placed in three school terms, following by Winter (January), Summer (May) and Fall (September). In addition to providing necessary information about studying and living in Canada, we want to reach out to all students in Vietnamese community to create a playground for meeting and exchanging personal experience.
